title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces in build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character is replaced with spaces in the first line so that both lines are visually indented the same, the ShiftLeft operation does not behave as expected. Currently, the text in the second line moves, but it is unclear how this behavior is specified. In the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left, and the first line should be shifted left at least up to the space character (removing the tab). Additionally, it is confusing when there is a stray space, as it is difficult to determine why the text won't shift.
